title: Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve
title_original: firfig Women Mesh Deep V Neck Open Back Sheer Long Sleeve Slit Leg Bridesmaid Maxi Dress Cocktail Party Wedding Guest Dresses

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #131,999 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #634 in Women's Formal Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Formal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: The dress was true to size and fit my wife perfectly. The material seems to be of good quality and the stitches see holding up after she's used it twice and washed it twice now. Only time will tell if it continues to hold up. The color has not faded either. Overall my wife really likes this dress and she said that it is comfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: Gian

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good
items.body: Not long as a pic Read more
items.author: L J

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is not floor length if you are looking for something long, it’s about ankle length
items.body: Fits weird in the chest area whether you are big chested or small. I am kind of in the middle and it didn’t fit quite how I liked/was to small Read more
items.author: Kamryn ash

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress for Any Occasion
items.body: This is a shockingly beautiful dress! It is elegant and comfortable, allowing you to wear it comfortably throughout the night. It fits well and flows well over the body while accentuating some parts. The fabric feels quality and sturdy, and the weight is decent. This dress is a wonderful price for how delightful it looks. Read more
items.author: The Shopper around the Corner

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Just no.
items.body: Just no. The material was so thin and stretchy that it hung very strangely. I'm 5'4" and 119 lbs. I got a size small and it was HUGE. It looked frumpy. The zipper was very hard to zip all the way to the top. The slit was not as high as described. The only thing that was good was the color. It was definitely true to the photo as far as color goes. It definitely does not look like the picture in any other way though. Very disappointed. Read more
items.author: Ashlei Clay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful formal Dress
items.body: This FirFig Women Mesh Deep V Neck is a beautiful and elegant formal peice. Very flowy and flattering. Neck line is not too revealing. The sleeves are sheer great for warmer weather. The slit is not too high yet gives a nice sexy look to the dress. Comfortable to wear. Good quality fabric and zipper. Read more
items.author: Jason

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very poor job on the selling
items.body: The dress is absolutely beautiful but there are so many flaws in the stitching. I expect address that cost almost $70 would have better attention paid to those details. These aren't small flaws, the seams are brunched and bunched where they should be straight causing strange bulges. The worst of it is on the front seam just above the split, which is very visible when wearing and makes the front of the dress look like it has been snagged and pulled. The sewing quality is really sad because overall the dress fits and feels like an absolute dream. Thankfully it isn't a total waste because I can add this to my costume bin and use it for the Ren Faire. I'm just really sad that I won't be able to use it for its intended purpose as a mother of the groom dress for a winter wedding. Read more
items.author: D.B.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok but not great
items.body: Fit is on the smaller side. Especially if you have a large bust (36DD). Mine had loose strings coming from the seams and the under-bust came up further than was flattering. It also was cut just low/wide enough in the back that the edges of my bra showed which was frustrating. I wore this as part of my Halloween costume so the quality from that standard was good, but for a general semi formal dress it would have been unacceptable in my opinion. I’m 5’4 and the length was perfect. Read more
items.author: MotherofDragons

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Cocktail Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine Red, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
